title: ISic004414. Epitaph for Eupolemos
body:
Facsimile Images

Εὐπολέμου

Apparatus criticus

text of Sofia 2018

English translation

(Tomb) of Eupolemos

commentary

The name Eupolemos is a common one, with at last seven other attestations on the island, all from eastern Sicily.

bibliography

  • Bacci and Coppolino 2009 41 fig.23 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002171
  • Bacci et al. 2015 161 and fig.83 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002593
  • Sofia 2015 115 fig.119 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001575
  • Sofia 2018 107 no.4 and fig.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001574
